Html:
Hi,

I replaced stars with the circles and i want to write the value on the circle. lets say 1 to 10. how can we achieve this?

 

Thanks

In the examples I've an example of a bar graph rating. This uses one wide image instead of one star that repeats horizontally. That would be the way to go for any rating in which the individual steps are different.

Sent from my iPhone
